mapper.insert: insert into planocycle.priority_all_restrict(priority_all_cd,company_cd,author_cd,shelf_pattern_cd,restrict_cd,zokusei1,zokusei2,zokusei3,zokusei4,zokusei5,zokusei6,zokusei7,zokusei8,zokusei9 ,zokusei10,tana_cnt,sku_cnt) select #{priorityAllCd},company_cd,author_cd,shelf_pattern_cd,restrict_cd,zokusei1,zokusei2,zokusei3,zokusei4,zokusei5,zokusei6,zokusei7,zokusei8,zokusei9 ,zokusei10,tana_cnt,sku_cnt from planocycle.work_priority_all_restrict where priority_all_cd = 0 and company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into planocycle.priority_all_result_data(priority_all_cd,company_cd,author_cd,shelf_patten_cd,restrict_cd,jan_cd,sku_rank,adopt_flag,face,face_sku,irisu,tai_cd ,tana_cd,tana_type,face_keisan,sales_cnt,face_fact,sort_rank) select #{priorityAllCd},company_cd,author_cd,shelf_patten_cd,restrict_cd,jan_cd,sku_rank,adopt_flag,face,face_sku,irisu,tai_cd ,tana_cd,tana_type,face_keisan,sales_cnt,face_fact,sort_rank from planocycle.work_priority_all_result_data where priority_all_cd = 0 and company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into planocycle.priority_all_pts_tana(priority_all_cd,company_cd,author_cd,shelf_patten_cd,tai_cd,tana_cd,tana_height,tana_width,tana_depth,tana_thickness ,tana_type,tana_nm,pts_cd) select #{priorityAllCd},company_cd,author_cd,shelf_patten_cd,tai_cd,tana_cd,tana_height,tana_width,tana_depth,tana_thickness ,tana_type,tana_nm,pts_cd from planocycle.work_priority_all_pts_tana where priority_all_cd = 0 and company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into planocycle.priority_all_pts_jans(priority_all_cd,company_cd,author_cd,shelf_patten_cd,tai_cd,tana_cd,tanaposition_cd,jan_cd,face_count,face_men, face_kaiten,tumiagesu,zaikosu,face_displayflg,face_position,depth_display_num,pts_cd) select #{priorityAllCd},company_cd,author_cd,shelf_patten_cd,tai_cd,tana_cd,tanaposition_cd,jan_cd,face_count,face_men, face_kaiten,tumiagesu,zaikosu,face_displayflg,face_position,depth_display_num,pts_cd from planocycle.work_priority_all_pts_jans where priority_all_cd = 0 and company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into planocycle.priority_all_pts_data( priority_all_cd,company_cd,author_cd,file_name,create_time,shelf_pattern_cd,valid_flg,start_day,edit_time, editer_cd,deleteflg,id) select #{priorityAllCd},company_cd,author_cd,file_name,create_time,shelf_pattern_cd,valid_flg,start_day,edit_time, editer_cd,deleteflg,id from planocycle.work_priority_all_pts_data where priority_all_cd = 0 and company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into planocycle.priority_all_pts_data_version(priority_all_cd,company_cd,author_cd,pts_cd,commoninfo,versioninfo,outflg,modename,tai_header,tana_header ,jan_header,deleteflg,shelf_pattern_cd) select #{priorityAllCd},company_cd,author_cd,pts_cd,commoninfo,versioninfo,outflg,modename,tai_header,tana_header ,jan_header,deleteflg,shelf_pattern_cd from planocycle.work_priority_all_pts_data_version where priority_all_cd = 0 and company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into planocycle.work_priority_all_mst( priority_all_cd, company_cd, author_cd, priority_all_nm, priority_order_cd) values(#{priorityAllCd}, #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '', #{priorityOrderCd})

insert into planocycle.work_priority_all_shelfs( priority_all_cd, company_cd, author_cd, shelf_patten_cd) values
(#{priorityAllCd}, #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list})
mapper.select: select priority_all_cd, priority_all_name,create_time,author_cd from planocycle.priority_all_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleteflg=0 and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by priority_all_cd desc

select shelfnm.shelf_name,shelf.shelf_pattern_cd,shelf.shelf_pattern_name ,count(distinct tana.tai_cd) as tai_cnt,count(tana.tana_cd) as tana_cnt ,case when allshelf.shelf_patten_cd is not null then 1 else 0 end as checkFlag from planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst shelf left join planocycle.work_priority_all_shelfs allshelf on allshelf.priority_all_cd = #{priorityAllCd} and allshelf.company_cd = shelf.company_cd and allshelf.shelf_patten_cd = shelf.shelf_pattern_cd and allshelf.author_cd = #{authorCd} inner join planocycle.shelf_name_mst shelfnm on shelf.shelf_name_cd = shelfnm.id inner join planocycle.shelf_pts_data pts on shelf.shelf_pattern_cd = pts.shelf_pattern_cd inner join planocycle.shelf_pts_data_taimst tai on pts.id = tai.pts_cd inner join planocycle.shelf_pts_data_tanamst tana on tai.pts_cd = tana.pts_cd and tai.tai_cd = tana.tai_cd where shelf.company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and shelf.shelf_name_cd = ( select shelf_name_cd from planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst where shelf_pattern_cd = #{patternCd}) and shelf.shelf_pattern_cd != #{patternCd} group by shelfnm.shelf_name,shelf.shelf_pattern_cd,shelf.shelf_pattern_name,allshelf.shelf_patten_cd order by shelf.shelf_pattern_cd
select priority_order_cd from planocycle.priority_all_mst where priority_all_cd = #{priorityAllCd} and company_cd = #{companyCd} and author_cd = #{authorCd}
select priority_all_cd from planocycle.priority_all_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd} and priority_all_name = #{priorityAllName} and author_cd = #{authorCd} and deleteflg = 0

select array_to_string(array_agg(DISTINCT id),',') from planocycle.priority_all_pts_data where company_cd = #{companyCd} and priority_all_cd = #{priorityAllCd} and author_cd = #{authorCd} and deleteflg = 0
select priority_order_cd from planocycle.work_priority_all_mst where priority_all_cd = #{priorityAllCd} and author_cd = #{authorCd} and company_cd=#{companyCd}
mapper.insert: insert into planocycle.all_pattern_restrict_result(shelf_pattern_cd,company_cd, author_cd,restrict_cd,sku_cnt,zokusei1,zokusei2,zokusei3,zokusei4,zokusei5, zokusei6,zokusei7,zokusei8,zokusei9,zokusei10,zokusei11,zokusei12,zokusei13,zokusei14, zokusei15,zokusei16,zokusei17,zokusei18,zokusei19,zokusei20,zokusei21,zokusei22,zokusei23, zokusei24,zokusei25,zokusei26,zokusei27,zokusei28,zokusei29, zokusei30,zokusei31, zokusei32,zokusei33, priority_all_cd) select shelf_pattern_cd,company_cd, author_cd,restrict_cd,sku_cnt,zokusei1,zokusei2,zokusei3,zokusei4,zokusei5, zokusei6,zokusei7,zokusei8,zokusei9,zokusei10,zokusei11,zokusei12,zokusei13,zokusei14, zokusei15,zokusei16,zokusei17,zokusei18,zokusei19,zokusei20,zokusei21,zokusei22,zokusei23, zokusei24,zokusei25,zokusei26,zokusei27,zokusei28,zokusei29, zokusei30,zokusei31, zokusei32,zokusei33, #{priorityAllCd} from planocycle.work_all_pattern_restrict_result where priority_all_cd = 0 and company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and author_cd = #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
